html: Consumers felt the lift as well, when @PSOklahoma, @ONEGasInc & @OGandE paid it forward in the form of savings for customers. The #TaxCutsAndJobsAct continues to deliver!

html: OK locations of national companies like: @Apple @HomeDepot @Lowes @BankofAmerica @CintasCorp @comcast @ChipotleTweets @Starbucks @Walmart @uhaul & more handed out bonuses to employees as a direct result of the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct

Oklahomans are benefiting from the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct --> As a direct result, many Oklahoma companies gave out bonuses to employees: @AAONHVAC @ExpressPros @dominocstores @webcotube @QuailCreekOK @QuikTrip & many more!

Happy #TaxDay, Oklahoma! Thanks to the #TaxCutsAndJobsAct, 90% of American workers have higher take-home pay. Employers of all sizes are hiring, raising wages, increasing benefits, and expanding operations.

html: We knew they couldn’t help themselves. Rep. Sherman files articles of impeachment on the President. Dems are more focused on stopping Trump than building the Wall and helping the country.
text:
We knew they couldn’t help themselves. Rep. Sherman files articles of impeachment on the President. 

Dems are more focused on stopping Trump than building the Wall and helping the country.

html: When will we say enough is enough? More than ever, border security is my priority as we work to reopen the government and take care of the American people.
text: When will we say enough is enough? More than ever, border security is my priority as we work to reopen the government and take care of the American people.

html: This sad news of a police officer in California killed by an illegal immigrant is just another instance where Democrat policies - like sanctuary cities and open borders - are protecting criminals instead of the American people.
text: This sad news of a police officer in California killed by an illegal immigrant is just another instance where Democrat policies - like sanctuary cities and open borders - are protecting criminals instead of the American people.

html: Once again, hardworking Americans are put in danger because of our inability to control illegal entry at our borders.https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/423029-sheriff-suspect-in-fatal-shooting-of-california-officer-in-us …
text: Once again, hardworking Americans are put in danger because of our inability to control illegal entry at our borders.https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/423029-sheriff-suspect-in-fatal-shooting-of-california-officer-in-us …

html: I hope this incentivizes my colleagues in Congress to make the safety of Americans their top priority.
text: I hope this incentivizes my colleagues in Congress to make the safety of Americans their top priority.

html: Members of Congress should not be paid during that time either.
text: Members of Congress should not be paid during that time either.

html: If we can’t come to an agreement on government funding and there is a lapse in appropriations, hundreds of thousands of federal employees around the country will be furloughed or working without pay.
text: If we can’t come to an agreement on government funding and there is a lapse in appropriations, hundreds of thousands of federal employees around the country will be furloughed or working without pay.

html: I’m proud to introduce a bill with my colleagues - in the event of a shutdown, Members of Congress should not get paid.
text: I’m proud to introduce a bill with my colleagues - in the event of a shutdown, Members of Congress should not get paid.

html: (3/3) The longer we let it go on, the harder it will be to recover and move on as a society. Mueller needs to wrap it up and realize what millions of Americans have known for a long time now: if there was something to find, he'd have found it by now.
text: (3/3) The longer we let it go on, the harder it will be to recover and move on as a society. Mueller needs to wrap it up and realize what millions of Americans have known for a long time now: if there was something to find, he'd have found it by now.

html: (2/3) This needless waste of taxpayer dollars must end. The never-ending political circus in Washington has been fueled by this fruitless investigation, deepening the divides between our lawmakers.
text: (2/3) This needless waste of taxpayer dollars must end. The never-ending political circus in Washington has been fueled by this fruitless investigation, deepening the divides between our lawmakers.

html: (1/3) Since Robert Mueller began investigating @realDonaldTrump, it has cost the American taxpayers over $300,000 a week - adding up to $25 million. After 19 months of this, it's clear the investigation is going nowhere.
text:
(1/3) Since Robert Mueller began investigating @realDonaldTrump, it has cost the American taxpayers over $300,000 a week - adding up to $25 million.
After 19 months of this, it's clear the investigation is going nowhere.
